title: Kindred

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - During the day, choose a player to Kidnap.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Kidnapped players cannot be visited that night, similar to how jail works. Attempted visitors get the message "You tried to visit your target, but they were kidnapped!"
- Kidnapped players cannot act. This goes through roleblock and control immunity.
- You may speak to your Kidnapped target at night.
 - You are considered a "jailor-type" role, for roles who interact with them (such as serial killers who kill the jailor if not executed).
- Other Vampires may visit the Kidnapped target.
- Once per game you may Kidnap a Vampire. They can still perform their night action, but others may not visit them.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Make man pay for their crimes against the natural order.
